mapper.insert:
insert into api_tb_game_kind
GAME_ID,
GAME_KIND_NO,
GAME_KIND_PARENT,
GAME_KIND_NAME
#{GAME_ID},
#{GAME_KIND_NO},
#{GAME_KIND_PARENT},
#{GAME_KIND_NAME}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.*,c.GAME_KIND_NAME as PARENT_NAME from api_tb_game_kind a left join api_tb_game b on a.GAME_ID=b.GAME_ID left join api_tb_game_kind c on a.GAME_KIND_PARENT=c.GAME_KIND_ID where a.GAME_KIND_ID=#{key}
select a.*,b.*,c.GAME_KIND_NAME as PARENT_NAME from api_tb_game_kind a left join api_tb_game b on a.GAME_ID=b.GAME_ID left join api_tb_game_kind c on a.GAME_KIND_PARENT=c.GAME_KIND_ID
